text: Mark LaVarre (born February 21, 1965 in Evanston, Illinois) is a retired American professional ice hockey right winger who played a career total of 78 games in the NHL. He played his entire NHL career with the Chicago Black Hawks. He was drafted by the Chicago Black Hawks with the 119th overall pick in the sixth round of the 1983 NHL Draft. == Other websites == * * Category:1965 births Category:American ice hockey right wingers Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Illinois
title: Mark LaVarre
